mapper.sql: id, folder_name, description, port_level, parent_id, is_directory, upd_username, upd_date, upd_time, crt_username, crt_date, crt_time
mapper.select: select id from t8_doc_manage where parent_id = #{id}
select folder_name,parent_id,is_directory from t8_doc_manage where id = #{id}
select id,folder_name,is_directory from t8_doc_manage where parent_id = #{id} order by is_directory desc,folder_name
mapper.update: update t8_doc_manage set description = #{description},folder_name = #{folderName},upd_username = #{username},upd_date = now(),upd_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from t8_doc_manage where parent_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t8_doc_manage( folder_name, description, port_level, parent_id, is_directory,crt_username, crt_date, crt_time, upd_username, upd_date, upd_time,src,size,type) values(#{folderName},#{description},#{portLevel},#{parentId},#{isDirectory},#{username},now(),now(), NULL, NULL, NULL,#{src},#{size},#{type})
mapper.select: select id,folder_name,is_directory from t8_doc_manage where parent_id = #{id} order by is_directory desc,folder_name

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
